title: You Need a Plan for Your Money (Hour 2)
description:
George Kamel & Kristina Ellis discuss:

How to best save for college,

Applying for scholarships later in life,

Selling your home,

Advising family on their money situations,

What to do with an old 401(k).


Support Our Sponsor:

Gazelle Debit Card

LegacyBox


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
